name: Crimson Decay
description:
This is a very very early build of the game. A lot of different aspects that we wanted to get in haven't been able to be implemented yet. This was a game jam project, too!

Some things that we want to be implemented soon are:

- more enemy types (already created but not ready yet)

- actually respawning enemies

- the ability to actually die

And other things that were supposed to be included but the time constraint of the game jam prevented us from being able to achieve...
